name: Dress for Success - San Francisco
description: The mission of Dress for Success San Francisco is to empower women to achieve economic independence by providing a network of support, professional attire and the development tools to help women thrive in work and in life. Dress for Success San Francisco: This chapter launched our programs in June 2006 and has provided career development services and retention programs to over 10,000 women throughout San Francisco and the Bay Area.
